TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示充当子元素集合的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此控件的子级支持 ，并且在可以按行和列进行遍历的二维逻辑坐标系统中进行组织。

span.span: The children of this control support and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持网格的活动操作;此功能需要 控件模式。 does not support active manipulation of a grid; the control pattern is required for this functionality. 有关可能支持此控件模式的控件的示例，请参阅[UI 自动化客户端的控件模式映射](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

related.span: 实现 UI 自动化 Grid 控件模式

span.span: Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用 进行请求。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用 获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在 中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将一个根元素传递到一个函数，该函数返回 UI 自动化元素的集合，这些元素是根的后代并且满足一组属性条件。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of UI Automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自具有 引用的 ，才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果 是使用 获取的，则它只包含缓存的数据，尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用 获取以前使用 指定的属性的已缓存值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息，请参阅 。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As AutomationElement

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 检索表示指定单元格的 。

span.span: Retrieves an that represents the specified cell.
An that represents the retrieved cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 网格坐标从零开始，左上方（或右上角单元格，具体取决于区域设置）的坐标为（0，0）。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). 如果某个单元格为空，则仍将返回 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素，以便支持该单元格的 属性的检索。If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the property for that cell. 当网格中的子元素的布局类似于未对齐的数组时，这是可能的，如下所示。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here. ![显示不规则布局的 Windows 资源管理器视图。](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "显示未对齐布局的 Windows 资源管理器视图。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 坐标为空的 Grid 控件的示例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将声明一个 侦听器来跟踪网格容器中网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 每次焦点更改事件时，项属性会回显到控制台。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus change event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

exception.span: 请求的行坐标或列坐标小于零。

span.span: Either the requested row or column coordinate is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 请求的行坐标大于 或列坐标大于 。

span.span: The requested row coordinate is larger than the or the column coordinate is larger than the .

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在 中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 将模式标识符传递给方法（如 ），以从指定的 中检索相关的控件模式。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，从 UI 自动化元素获取 控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在 中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将一个根元素传递到一个函数，该函数返回作为根的后代并满足一组属性条件的自动化元素的集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. 此示例检索支持 的 UI 自动化元素，但树中目前只有一项。This example retrieves the UI Automation elements that support but currently have only one item in the tree. [!code-csharp[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAGridPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridPattern_snippets.vb#100)]
